itunes:title: EPISODE 291: The Regime Wants to Lock Up Steve Bannon This Week
title: EPISODE 291: The Regime Wants to Lock Up Steve Bannon This Week
description:
On today’s episode of Human Events Daily, Jack Posobiec breaks down the sham show trial from the sham J6 Committee and their recent sham verdict to sentence Bannon to a 6-month sentence on October 21st - thanks Biden DOJ. Next in criminal justice, the Waukesha parade massacre trial is a complete mockery as Darrell Brooks plays games in court representing himself. The CCP warned Chinese citizens to get out of Ukraine just before the Kiev kamikaze bombing - Xi Jinping knew! An EU prosecutor opened a probe into secret deals between Pfizer CEO and the EU for Covid vaccine purchases. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


Go to www.itargetpro.com to get 10% off and free shipping with offer code POSO
